chat_empty_message: Chat is ready. Please write your message below and press enter
chat_init_message: Thank you for your patience. We are initiating new chat with the stand.
chat_meeting_congrats_text: Your meeting has been scheduled successfully!
chat_assign_congrats_text: The contact has been assigned successfully!
chat_deactivate_tooltip: Close chat and hide it until user will write something
chat_unassign_tooltip: Leave chat as active and avaliable for your colleagues to assign to themselves.
chat_assign_tooltip: Change chat owner to one of your colleagues. Only the owner can see chat contents.
chat_block_info: Blocked contacs will no longer be able to send you messages.
chat_report_info: Select the reason you want to report this contact to Openexpo
chat_assigning_second: something about the user you are assigning?
chat_person_info: Write any relevant information about the new contact
